entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
